body_html:
Thanks for the very detailed report and the instructions to reproduce, this helps a lot.

I believe 5fb1aea fixes the issue and was able to verify that your sample succeeds when using 1.1.0-rc1 instead of 1.0.1 (available at: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.1.0-rc1.tar.gz and similar links for gpu/OS X).

Closing this out since it is fixed in the latest release candidate.

Let us know if that is not the case or if you have other concerns.
body_text:

Closing this out since it is fixed in the latest release candidate.
Let us know if that is not the case or if you have other concerns.
body:
Thanks for the very detailed report and the instructions to reproduce, this helps a lot.

I believe https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/5fb1aeaa6df73fe3ed6e66c034cf4202e3aa90ed fixes the issue and was able to verify that your sample succeeds when using 1.1.0-rc1 instead of 1.0.1 (available at: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/libtensorflow/libtensorflow-cpu-linux-x86_64-1.1.0-rc1.tar.gz and similar links for gpu/OS X).

Closing this out since it is fixed in the latest release candidate.

Let us know if that is not the case or if you have other concerns.
